review.comment: Great service, gentle touch, didn't try to upsell. Brilliant.

Mid-afternoon emergency on a Friday and I cracked a front tooth that also had a veneer. My regular dentist was closed so then made many phone calls to local dentists, none of which could fit me in. After extending my search a little wider I called Morton Dental and bingo they could fit me in, straight away :-) Dr Henry saw me, had a look and said we can possibly save the veneer and recement in on. Job done. Great work Henry and thanks to the lovely lady on reception too. I would certainly recommend Morton Dental.
Great service and lovely team! Very professional

As a new patient, I am highly satisfied with my experience at Morton Dental. This well organised practice has a young and very professional team. Arvi is a skilled dentist and a clear communicator. Thanks all for your work.
Been going here for years - Jeff, Arv, Kelly and Rachel are awesome- super friendly and helpful
At short notice were very helpful and accommodating for emergency treatment.
Great service, great staff (Margaret,Arv and Kally) made my teeth fresh and clean once again!

Having only been in Noosa for 18 months, I had to undertake the pesky task of finding a new dentist - not only an adept technician but a dentist with good people skills, too - a big ask!!
Well, after some disappointing experiences with a couple of dental practices, a friend recommended Morton Dental.
So, I made an appointment for a check-up and believe it or not, I hit the jackpot - a dental practice that ticks all the boxes; nice, friendly, genuine staff, great work and a desire to 'go the extra mile'  and guarantee customer satisfaction.
Check them out - you'll be all smiles, too.
Had a luvly experience with luvly Rachel on reception, which settled my nerves right down. Awesome appt & great dentist
Very friendly and professional staff. Dr Leach was great!  She made me feel relaxed and comfortable. There was no upselling and I left very happy with my treatment. I would definitely go back

I first contacted Morton Dental after a very bad experience of dental treatment in Phuket Thailand approximately 2 years ago.   I was very upset and unsure of damage done to my mouth and teeth.  The dentists at Morton Dental have always dealt with my concerns and fears in a very professional and concerned way.  I was never made to feel stupid for risking my teeth overseas and gradually the damage has been corrected.  I cannot thank them enough for their ongoing support and would not think of going anywhere else now.
I am usually a nervous patient but all the staff at Morton Dental are so lovely, helpful & professional I feel more & more comfortable every time I visit. I won’t go anywhere else!!
